selected_quotes: Integrated disease management for #COPD patients cut hospital admissions improved QoL exercise capacity #Cochrane
Cochrane review shows MDT integrated programmes for COPD associated with better QOL, exercise capacity admissions
Cochrane - benefits of integrated care for #COPD (much of this the effects of pulmonary rehabilitation?)
(Cochrane) Abordaje de la EPOC mejor integral y en equipo

citation.abstract: In people with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) there is considerable variation in symptoms, limitations and well-being, which often complicates medical care. To improve quality of life (QoL) and exercise tolerance, while reducing the number of exacerbations, a multidisciplinary program including different elements of care is needed.
citation.title: Integrated disease management interventions for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease

facebook.summary: Cochrane review finds that #interprofessional team is necessary for integrated disease management of COPD
